content: cream yarn start at the aster flower petal tip row 1 rs kfb knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 5 sts aster petal layers row 2 to 4 repeat row 1 three more times 8 sts make 2 per flower using 3 25mm single row 5 to 6 knit to last stitch sl1 wyif pointed needles and row 7 k2tog knit to last stitch sl1 wyif 7 sts pale cream yarn work a row 8 to 10 repeat row 7 three more times 4 sts picot cast on as follows break the working yarn and transfer the 4 sts onto a * cast on 10 sts using the cable cast on cast off the stitch holder * first 8 sts slip the 1 stitch on the rh needle purl- wise back onto the lh needle * then repeat from * to repeat from * to * four more times to make 5 petals * thirteen more times to cast on 28 sts join petals row 1 rs k2tog 14 times 28 sts transfer the 5 petals from the stitch holder onto a row 2 k2tog 7 times 7 sts 3 25mm needle rs of all pieces facing you rejoin the pale cream yarn and work across all 20 sts to pull through to cast off join the petals row 1 rs k2tog 10 times 10 sts aster centre disc pull through to cast off follow the anemone centre disc patt in pale yellow yarn anemone centre disc make 1 per flower using the long tail cast on for a making up for each petal layer knot cast on and stretchy edge cast on 18 sts using 3 25mm single off tails decrease firmly to make a ring of petals place pointed needles and pale yellow yarn start at the the 2 layers on top of each other for the centre outer edge disc sew side edges decrease to make a circle shape and sew the centre of the disc on top of the petal row 1 ws knit layers and weave in any tails on the back of the row 2 rs k2tog 9 times 9 sts petals pull through to cast off spring delight wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 5 of 15 beech leaves row 1 rs k1 kfb 8 times k1 18 sts row 2 ws purl beech leaves break the pale yellow yarn and join graphite grey ⇨ note the other row 3 knit beech leaves are knitted in break the graphite grey yarn and join pale yellow mid green yarn instead of pale green row 4 purl make 1 per leaf cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm single break the pale yellow yarn and join graphite grey pointed needles and pale green yarn start at the base of the leaf row 5 knit row 1 to 4 k3 sl1 wyif break the graphite grey yarn and join pale yellow row 5 rs k1 yo 2 times k1 sl1 wyif 6 sts row 6
